description: Ms. codex. Title from title page (fol. 1a in the modern foliation). Physical description: 14 lines per page. Written in medium small taʻlīq, in black ink with use of red and green. Thick woven paper, glossy ; frame-ruled. Table of contents on two leaves of blue paper pasted between the first fol. and fol. 1 in the modern foliation. Modern foliation in pencil using Western numerals (omits the first leaf). Several inscriptions on fol. 67b. Inscription in Arabic script on a label pasted on the upper cover: "Tawḥīd 119". Inscription in Arabic script on a label pasted on the pastedown of the upper cover: "957/2 ḥāʼ". Collation: Paper, fol. i, 6, ii ; i (free endpaper, verso marbled) 1-6¹⁰ 6⁶ i (later added fly-leaf) i (free endpaper, verso marbled); catchword on the verso of each leaf. Origin: Copied for(?) Dāniyāl by al-Ākh ʻAmr Khān (colophon, fol. 66b). Incipit: الحمد لله الذى هدانا للايمان والاسلام برسوله محمد عليه وعلى اله وصحبه افضل الصلاة والسلام اما بعد فهذه رسالة مشيرة الى فروض عينية من اعقائد السنية ومن احكام ربع العبادة على مذهب الشافعية Explicit: او علم شرعى او اسم الله تعالى او اسم بنىّ او ملك فى نجاسة او قذى يلطخ ذلك او مسجدا ببخرق لو معفوا عنه عافانا الله تعالى ووفانا من الوقوع فيها وفى غيرها مما يوجب الحرمان عن فضله تعالى بالعفو والغفران
author: Qarāhī, Muḥammad Ṭāhir, d. 1882
abstract: Treatise on legal questions according to Shāfiʻī fiqh.
extent: i, 66, ii leaves : paper ; 178 x 110 (130 x 75) mm. bound to 190 x 120 mm.
title: al-Mafrūḍ ʻalá muʼaddī al-furūḍ min ʻilm al-tawḥīd wa-rubʻ al-ʻibādah
creator: قراخي، محمد طاهر
subject: Danii︠a︡l-sultan—Library
binding note: Marbled paper over pasteboards for upper and lower covers. Marbled paper pastedown and free endpaper.
member of collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
